tasks.label: tests
tasks.command: docker compose exec -it django bash -c './docker/django-init.sh && python manage.py test --keepdb'

tasks.label: tests-debug
tasks.command: docker compose exec -it django bash -c './docker/django-init.debug.sh && python /usr/local/debugpy --wait-for-client --listen 0.0.0.0:5679 manage.py test --keepdb'
